133 #ifndef NO_LOGGER
134 #define Log(level) \
135  if (level > rr::Logger::getLevel()) { ; } \
136  else rr::LoggingBuffer(level, __FILE__, __LINE__).stream()
137 #else
138 #define Log(level) \
139  if (true) { }\
140  else \
141  LoggingBuffer(level, __FILE__, __LINE__)
142 #endif
